text: Feng Wang is an American physicist, currently at University of California, Berkeley and an Elected Fellow of the American Physical Society. ==Education== Wang received a B.A. from Fudan University, Shanghai, in 1999 and a Ph.D. from Columbia University in 2004. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Physical Society Category:University of California, Berkeley faculty Category:21st-century American physicists Category:Columbia University alumni Category:Fudan University alumni
title: Feng Wang (physicist)
